tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: Zambia is known for its stunning natural attractions, including the Victoria Falls, one of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world.

tidbits.title: Diverse Wildlife
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse wildlife, with national parks like South Luangwa and Kafue offering excellent opportunities for safaris and animal sightings.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Zambia has a diverse cultural landscape with over 70 ethnic groups, each contributing unique traditions, music, dances, and vibrant artwork.
